name: draganddroplist
description: A list component that can be dragged and dropped anywhere on the page. Each item displays a title and subtitle. Supports grouping, tap events, and custom titles.

data.name: data
data.description: Array of items to render in the list. Each item must have a unique 'key' or 'id' property (string or number).

title.name: title
title.description: Optional title to display at the top of the list.

groupBy.name: groupBy
groupBy.description: Property name or function to group items by. Can be a string (property name) or a function that returns a group key.

style.name: style
style.description: Custom style for the list container.

onTap.name: onTap
onTap.description: Callback when a list item is tapped. Returns the item and its index.

onDrop.name: onDrop
onDrop.description: Callback when the list is dropped. Returns the new position (x, y).
